tokenRequiredNotice: Please set Dinox token in plugin settings.
dirCreateFailedNotice: Failed to create base directory '{dir}'. Check permissions or path validity.
syncTimeResetNotice: Dinox sync time reset. Next sync will fetch all notes.
noteIdNotFoundNotice: Could not find Dinox Note ID in the frontmatter.
malformedFrontmatterWarning: Warning: Frontmatter might be malformed. Syncing full content.
sendFailedNotice: Failed to send content to Dinox: {message}
syncDirSettingDesc: Path relative to your vault root where notes will be stored.
invalidPathNotice: Please enter a valid relative path.
apiTokenSettingDesc: Get your token from the Dinox web application.
autoSyncSettingDesc: Automatically sync notes from Dinox every 30 minutes.
filenameFormatSettingDesc: Choose how note files should be named.
filenameFormatTitle: Note Title (May cause issues with duplicates or invalid characters)
fileLayoutSettingDesc: Organize notes into daily folders or keep them flat.
templateSettingDesc: Define the structure of the note content using Handlebars syntax (use with caution, might break sync). Variables: {{title}}, {{noteId}}, {{createTime}}, {{updateTime}}, {{content}}, {{#tags}}, {{.}}, {{/tags}}, etc.
